name: Christmas Game Jam
description:
This game was made in ~6 hours for a short game jam during work hours. 

The main idea giver was Calada2 and he also provided the leaf textures and some testing for the game, too.

To play

  •  Just left click on one of the soil spots to grow a tree. 
  • Click the soil again to remove that tree. 
  • Click on a tree to select it.
    • When two trees are selected, the tree generated afterwards on the third spot will be a mix between the two parents (mainly just the color) with a slight variation chance.
      • For example, if you get two more blue-ish trees to generate, then the third one will have a small chance to be more blue. With this you can get a tree a completely blue tree sooner or later ;)
